title: Information technology teams help reimagine teaching, learning
content: Working almost 25 years at the University, Luis Vidal, senior manager of information technology, has taken the opportunity to grow and learn from various challenges, including navigating the changes brought about by hybrid teaching and learning. In his role at the College of Arts and Sciences, Vidal and his colleagues are helping to reimagine the classroom experience today that may impact them in the future. Watch the video to hear Vidal share his story and his experiences as a University employee.
This video was shared with the University community during the 2021 State of the University Town Hall on Sept. 28. Access more videos online.
